name: DRUM TILES: Music Game
description:
Play the drums in a fun way with DRUM TILES!

Test your skills and reflexes and make the highest score and take first place in ranking!

Don't know how to play?
Just tap the tiles at the right time and play any song, and the more you get it the higher your score!

Relax and kill time anywhere and play a lot of music with this magic fun game!

Totally free.
Same creator of REAL DRUM.

DRUM TILES lets you try the true drumming experience in any music style! A free, fun, user-friendly game! Download it now and enjoy!

How does DRUM TILES work?
The game transforms your phone/tablet screen into a lifelike simulation of a drum kit. Watch as your fingertips magically transform into drumsticks! For instant playback, all you need do is tap on the tiles.

Using the app is simplicity itself, play anywhere and put your skills to the test!

Check out the DRUM TILES specs:
- New kits every week
- Multitouch
- Studio-quality sound
- Several tutorials
- Works with all screen resolutions - Phones e Tablets (HD Images)
- Free app
- Several styles: Rock, Heavy Metal, Reggaeton, Brazilian Music, Hip Hop, Trap, Classical, EDM, Hard Rock, Country, Latin and more....

Have a bash and a blast with the best and most comprehensive drum game on Play Store!

Touch & Play!
